_header: O queen of pity and of grace
Subjects: carols, to Virgin Mary; Virgin Mary, carols to
_description: James Ryman, a hymn to the Virgin Mary — eight stanzas rhyme royal and burden: ‘O quene of pitee moder of grace / In the high citee graunt vs a place’

CULEe112.First Lines:
O quene of pitee and of graceO swete lady to thy dere
                    chielde…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…So that we may comme to that blisWherof the Ioye eternall
                    is
CULEe112.Attributed Author:
…quem composuit ffrater Jacobus Ryman ordinis Minorum…
                    (f. 80)
CULEe112.Attributed Title:
Explicit liber ympnorum et canticorum quem composuit ffrater Jacobus
                        Ryman ordinis Minorum ad laudem omnipotentis dei & sanctissime matris
                        eius marie omnique sanctorum anno domini Millessimo ccccmo
                            xxxxijo (f. 80)
